code: import"./App.css";import Navbar from"./components/Navbar";import Footer from"./components/Footer";import{Outlet}from'react-router-dom';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{getMovies,getSeries,getToprated,getTrending}from"./store/MovieSlice";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const dispatch=useDispatch();useEffect(()=>{dispatch(getMovies());dispatch(getSeries());dispatch(getToprated());dispatch(getTrending());},[dispatch]);const{movies,series,toprated,trending}=useSelector(state=>state.movietv);const[size,setSize]=useState(6);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App flex ",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{size:size,resize:newsize=>setSize(newsize)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main min-h-screen",style:{width:"".concat(100-size,"%"),marginLeft:"".concat(size,"%")},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Outlet,{context:{movies,series,toprated,trending,size}})})]})});}export default App;
